pages.text: This curse weakens the flesh, making the target more susceptible to all of the Dark: poisons become more potent, demons hit harder and rumor has it that this curse is even tied to much worse fates such as $(l:bewitchment:curses/vampirism)$(marked)vampirism$() and $(l:bewitchment:curses/lycanthropy)$(marked)lycanthropy$().
This is a greater curse; it is slightly harder to get rid of.
